item.title: Avoid the After-Click Abyss
item.description: Marketers spend millions perfecting targeting and creative, but then lose the customer.

item.description: Rising premiums are draining budgets and weakening competitiveness, but new benefit models offer practical ways to control costs and stay competitive.

item.description: Smart salespeople have discovered that reaching the right prospects at the right time matters more than customization.

item.description: Organizations evolve as business needs change, but not every manager is good at running the process.

item.title: Neuroscience Explains How and Why Humans Should Hibernate a Little in Winter
item.description: You’re not just lazy or tired in winter. Your body wants you to show down and recharge. So go ahead and (semi) hibernate.
